author: Ursula Perano
title: WHO official warns coronavirus may "stalk the human race" until there's a vaccine
description: World Health Organization special envoy Dr. David Nabarro warned on NBC's "Meet the Press" Sunday that the coronavirus is not expected to come in seasonal waves like influenza, and that there will continue to be outbreaks that emerge "sporadically" until ther…
